plot.plot_summary: The Fifth Doctor faces troubling aftereffects of regeneration while his companions attempt to help him recover on the tranquil planet of Castrovalva. Meanwhile, the Master has captured Adric and intends to use him to ensnare the Doctor in an elaborate trap. The story unfolds as the Doctor's health improves and they uncover the true nature of Castrovalva and the Master's plan, culminating in a confrontation that sees the Master trapped, while the Doctor and his companions escape.
Part One introduces the Fifth Doctor's struggles post-regeneration and his companions' efforts to pilfer the TARDIS and navigate the Master's machinations, leading them to Castrovalva.
Part Two continues the theme of the Doctor's recovery as he regains some stability, but the Master's machinations unveil the complexities of the TARDIS's journey and the nature of the universe.
Parts Three and Four bring the Doctor face-to-face with the truth of Castrovalva as it begins to collapse, revealing the Master’s plot and leading to a tense resolution.
